item.title: TWO DOGS IN TOILET ELDERLY LADY INVOLVED
item.description: Matt Dray TL;DR Animals get stuck in weird places. Oh, and the sf package in R can be used for coordinate reprojection prior to interactive mapping with leaflet. The problem I often work with data that has coordinates; usually a eastings and northings. I need to convert these to latitude and longitude for interactive mapping using the leaflet package in R.

item.title: R Trek: exploring stardates
item.description: Matt Dray Captainâ€™s log ðŸ“– Star date 71750.51. Our mission is to use R statistical software to extract star dates mentioned in the captainâ€™s log from the scripts of Star Trek: The Next Generation and observe their progression over the course of the showâ€™s seven seasons. There appears to be some mismatch in the frequency of digits after the decimal point â€“ could this indicate poor abillity to choose random numbers?

item.title: About
item.description: Us Adriana De Palma Twitter | academia.edu | Google Scholar | NHM Iâ€™m a Postdoctoral Researcher at the Natural History Museum, London. I have a PhD in Ecology and an MRes in Entomology from Imperial College London, and a BSc in Biology from the University of Sussex. In terms of my research, I am particularly interested in using large scale ecological datasets to answer policy relevant questions. I work on the PREDICTS project with Andy Purvis, looking at how biodiversity responds over time to land-use change and related pressures.
